        public IOperator takeYourStep(byte[][] theBoard)
                       throws TError
        Retrieves the step taken by the artificial player. Here have to be invocate the minmax algorithm.
        Specified by:
        takeYourStep in interface IAIPlayer
        Parameters:
        theBoard - The board on which the next step have to be taken.
        Returns:

        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.
